text:
Hey partners,

In the new workflows interface, you can now search for an action, which helpfully brings up suggested apps...

Does anyone have data to see how many people are using the search feature and if 'Workflow SEO' is going to be a thing? :eyes:

Dropping this here once more, because I’m currently listening to the sessions of <@U037QED9TR6>, <@UDF0QRPNZ>, and <@U03LX43UMT5>, and you definitely do NOT want to miss this if you are working on Marketplace Apps

<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/teunrutten_webinar-HubSpot-HubSpotadvocate-activity-7165802743205457921-JYCM?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop|https://www.linkedin.com/posts/teunrutten_webinar-HubSpot-HubSpotadvocate-activity-71[…]743205457921-JYCM?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>

Thanks Tuen, <@UDF0QRPNZ> and <@U03LX43UMT5> covering important Tech and GTM topics. I’m covering designing “HubSpot First”, pricing, getting your first 100 active installs, demarcation between your Control Plane and App Plane especially if you plan to release a 2nd app, along with an app create and listing live demo. Plus tips for gotchas and pitfalls once your app goes live. So much to cover so little time! See you there
